$description: Lumina Design System — pixel-perfect token reference extracted from the component library screenshot. Use this file as the single source of truth to replicate the UI with 95%+ accuracy.

primary.$description: Blue palette — main brand color used for primary actions, active states, links

emerald.$description: Green palette — used for success states, confirmations, positive feedback

orange.$description: Orange palette — used for warning states, pending indicators, attention items

yellow.$description: Yellow palette — used for caution banners, highlight badges

red.$description: Red palette — used for error states, destructive actions, alerts

secondary.$description: Mixed accent palette containing blue-700, purple-600, pink-500, and cyan-400 for secondary highlights

neutral.$description: Gray scale used for text, borders, backgrounds, disabled states

fontFamily.mono: 'SF Mono', 'Fira Code', 'Fira Mono', Menlo, Consolas, monospace

xs.usage: Tiny labels, badge text, metadata timestamps

sm.usage: Tag text, small button labels, helper text, status pill text

base.usage: Body text, table cells, input values, list items, navigation items

lg.usage: Section headers (Benefits, Tags), large button text, card titles

xl.usage: Page sub-headings, People in this room heading

buttons.$description: 4 sizes of buttons. Each size has filled and outlined variants. Filled uses emerald-500 bg; outlined uses white bg with emerald-500 border and text.

primary.$description: Blue primary action button, used for 'Start Conversation', CTA

ghost.$description: Text-only button with no background, used for secondary actions like 'Change', 'Remove'

outlinedNeutral.$description: Neutral outlined buttons like 'Make a Booking', 'Book an event'

textLink.$description: Join a Plan style text button with green color

iconPlacement.iconOnly: padding equal on all sides, centered icon

tags.$description: Small categorization labels. Plain grey for categories (Hot Desk, Wi-fi), colored for statuses.

statusPills.$description: Status indicators in conversation list rows (Replied, Open, Closed)

conversationList.$description: Table-like list with columns: Created by (avatar + name), Replies (icon + count), Status (pill)

navigationTabs.$description: Segmented tab controls (Card View/Calendar View/Floorplan View, Month/Week/Day, Following/My Conversations/My Inbox)

activecolored.$description: Colored active state (Calendar View = blue/primary bg)

cards.$description: Content container cards used throughout the UI

bookingCard.$description: Desk 8 booking card with image, details, price, amenities

stack.$description: Overlapping avatar group (People in this room)

progressBar.$description: Horizontal progress bars (All day pass 6/10, Booking credits 8/20)

tooltip.$description: Dark background tooltip (This booking has not yet been confirmed!)

inputChip.$description: Tag chips in input fields (Invite to Conversation, Tags). Shows selected items with remove X.

withAvatar.$description: Philip Smith chip has avatar + name + X button

sidebar.$description: Left sidebar navigation with menu items and icon grid

iconGrid.$description: Icon toolbar grid at bottom of sidebar area

userMenu.$description: User identity chip (Adrian, Q. with avatar and caret)

notificationBadge.$description: Red circular notification count badge on icons

errorBanner.$description: Pink/red error banners (You cannot request a booking in the past!, resource not available)

benefitsSection.$description: Benefits panel with title, 'View all' link, items with progress bars

colorSwatches.$description: Color palette display rows showing shade progressions

commentBubble.$description: Activity comment row with avatar, name, timestamp, message text

integrationCard.$description: Apple Calendar integration row with icon, title, description, toggle

actionBar.$description: Horizontal row of outlined action buttons with icons (Make a Booking, Book an event, Buy a product, Access your account)

dropdownMenu.$description: Sidebar dropdown menu (My Bookings, My Tickets, Visitors, etc.)

colorBlindSafe.note: Status indicators use both color AND icon/shape to convey meaning (dot, checkmark, x-circle). Never rely on color alone.

ariaPatterns.tags: role=status for status tags, removable tags use role=option in a listbox

reducedMotion.behavior: Disable all transitions/animations, show final state immediately

screenReaderText.styles: position:absolute; width:1px; height:1px; padding:0; margin:-1px; overflow:hidden; clip:rect(0,0,0,0); white-space:nowrap; border-width:0

mobile.buttons: full width in modals, inline elsewhere
